## ScriptRegistry.resolveRuntimeUrl() method

Resolves a module entry to a URL suitable for dynamic import.

Behavior: - In editor mode, builds the module to a data URL. - Otherwise, returns `.js` URL directly: - If `id` ends with `.js`<!-- -->: return as-is. - If `id` ends with `.ts`<!-- -->: map to `.js` (assumes pre-built file exists). - Else: append `.js`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolveRuntimeUrl(entryId: string): Promise<string>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

entryId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Entry module identifier (logical or path-like).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

A URL string that can be used in `import(...)`<!-- -->.
